page.title: 18CLUBS AROUND OSSINGTON.(1).
page.content: The church related group of the {Mothers Union}is the only club to be based in the village of Ossington itself and meetings are held once a month, usually at the home of one of the members. It helps to promote a feeling of fellowship and is an opportunity for the village ladies to meet together to discuss various chosen topics. At this particular time the enrolling member is the wife of the local vicar and it is she who takes control of the meeting. There is also a weekly{yoga class attended by a small number of ladies. This form of relaxation may take place in the local village hall which is commonly referred to as the{'Hut'.
